languages.text: "Я была слаба. Не желала уходить в длани Его. Но глаза мои заволокла пелена... И я увидела ее — испуганную девочку. Нааки. Ту часть меня, что не смог стереть даже ритуал отказа от бремени. И я поняла: все это время часть меня держалась за прошлое, которого даже не помнила. И страх перед смертью отступил. Я отпустила Нааки — к Неумирающему, который ждал ее слишком долго. И разбитое стало цельным. Нааки ушла. Осталась только Кибелла".

traits.locale_text: "Смерть назвала имя... Но убить человека можно не только клинком или ядом. Вычеркни его из людской памяти, и человек исчезнет, словно и не существовал вовсе. Вычеркни всех, кто знал его — исход будет тем же. Мое же сердце остановилось в миг горького осознания: мне... и правда пора. Но я была слаба. Не желала уходить. Боялась оказаться в дланях Его."

languages.text: "I was weak. Reluctant to be taken in His hands. But then a haze clouded my eyes... And I saw her. A frightened girl. Naaki. The part of me even the ritual of releasing the burden had failed to erase. And I knew that a part of me had always clung to a past I did not even remember. My fear of death subsided. I let Naaki go, for the Undying One had been waiting to take her. And what was broken became whole. Naaki is gone. Only Kibellah remains."
languages.original_text: "Я была слаба. Не желала уходить в длани Его. Но глаза мои заволокла пелена... И я увидела ее — испуганную девочку. Нааки. Ту часть меня, что не смог стереть даже ритуал отказа от бремени. И я поняла: все это время часть меня держалась за прошлое, которого даже не помнила. И страх перед смертью отступил. Я отпустила Нааки — к Неумирающему, который ждал ее слишком долго. И разбитое стало цельным. Нааки ушла. Осталась только Кибелла".

traits.locale_text: "I was weak. Reluctant to be taken in His hands. But then a haze clouded my eyes... And I saw her. A frightened girl. Naaki. The part of me even the ritual of releasing the burden had failed to erase. And I knew that a part of me had always clung to a past I did not even remember. My fear of death subsided. I let Naaki go, for the Undying One had been waiting to take her. And what was broken became whole. Naaki is gone. Only Kibellah remains."

"Death spoke a name... And my heart stopped at that instant of bitter realisation: it... really was my time to go. I was weak. Reluctant to be taken in His hands. But a haze clouded my eyes... And I saw her. A frightened girl. Naaki. The part of me even Yuh'shin failed to erase. And I knew that a part of me had always been holding on to a past it did not even remember. And my fear of death subsided. I let Naaki go — to the Undying One, who had been waiting for her too long. And what was broken became whole. Naaki was gone. Only Kibellah remained."

"Death spoke a name... And my heart stopped at that instant of bitter realisation. It... truly was my time to go. I was weak. Reluctant to be taken in His hands. But a haze clouded my eyes... And I saw her. A frightened girl. Naaki. The part of me even the ritual of releasing the burden had failed to erase. And I knew that a part of me had always clung to a past I did not even remember. My fear of death subsided. I let Naaki go, for the Undying One had been waiting to take her. And what was broken became whole. Naaki is gone. Only Kibellah remains."

I let Naaki go, for the Undying One had been waiting to take her. And what was broken became whole. Naaki is gone. Only Kibellah remains."

languages.text: « J'ai fait preuve de faiblesse. J'étais réticente à m'abandonner entre Ses bras. Mais c'est alors qu'un voile de brume s'est abattu devant mes yeux... et que je l'ai vue. Une petite fille terrifiée. Naaki. La partie de moi que le rituel de renoncement lui-même n'avait pas réussi à effacer. J'ai tout de suite compris qu'elle s'était toujours raccrochée à un passé dont je ne conservais pas le moindre souvenir. Ma peur de la mort s'est dissipée et je l'ai laissée partir, car l'Immortel attendait depuis longtemps de l'accueillir dans Son giron. À cet instant précis, les fragments de ce qui était brisé se sont enfin rassemblés. Naaki n'est plus, seule demeure Kibellah. »
languages.original_text: "I was weak. Reluctant to be taken in His hands. But then a haze clouded my eyes... And I saw her. A frightened girl. Naaki. The part of me even the ritual of releasing the burden had failed to erase. And I knew that a part of me had always clung to a past I did not even remember. My fear of death subsided. I let Naaki go, for the Undying One had been waiting to take her. And what was broken became whole. Naaki is gone. Only Kibellah remains."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai fait preuve de faiblesse. J'étais réticente à m'abandonner entre Ses bras. Mais c'est alors qu'un voile de brume s'est abattu devant mes yeux... et que je l'ai vue. Une petite fille terrifiée. Naaki. La partie de moi que le rituel de renoncement lui-même n'avait pas réussi à effacer. J'ai tout de suite compris qu'elle s'était toujours raccrochée à un passé dont je ne conservais pas le moindre souvenir. Ma peur de la mort s'est dissipée et je l'ai laissée partir, car l'Immortel attendait depuis longtemps de l'accueillir dans Son giron. À cet instant précis, les fragments de ce qui était brisé se sont enfin rassemblés. Naaki n'est plus, seule demeure Kibellah. »

languages.text: «Era débil. Reacia a caer en Sus manos. Pero entonces una neblina me nubló los ojos... y la vi. A una chica asustada, a Naaki. La parte de mí que ni siquiera el ritual de liberación de toda carga podía eliminar. Y entonces supe que una parte de mí siempre se había aferrado a un pasado que ni siquiera recordaba. Desapareció ese miedo a morir y dejé ir a Naaki, pues el Inmortal estaba esperando para llevársela. Y lo que estaba roto se recompuso. Naaki ya no existe, solo queda Kibellah».
languages.original_text: "I was weak. Reluctant to be taken in His hands. But then a haze clouded my eyes... And I saw her. A frightened girl. Naaki. The part of me even the ritual of releasing the burden had failed to erase. And I knew that a part of me had always clung to a past I did not even remember. My fear of death subsided. I let Naaki go, for the Undying One had been waiting to take her. And what was broken became whole. Naaki is gone. Only Kibellah remains."

La parte de mí que ni siquiera el ritual de liberación de toda carga podía eliminar. Y entonces supe que una parte de mí siempre se había aferrado a un pasado que ni siquiera recordaba. Desapareció ese miedo a morir y dejé ir a Naaki, pues el Inmortal estaba esperando para llevársela. Y lo que estaba roto se recompuso. Naaki ya no existe, solo queda Kibellah».

languages.text: 「我は弱かったのです。あの方の手に渡ることに消極的でした。ですが靄で視界が曇って…彼女を見ました。怯えた少女。ナアキです。解放の儀式でさえ、我が一部を消し去ることはできませんでした。そして我が一部は、覚えてもいない過去にしがみついていたのだと知った。死への恐怖は鎮まり、ナアキを解放した。彼女を迎えるために不死の者が待っていたのだから。そして壊れたところが埋まりました。ナアキは死んだのです。残ったのはキベラだけ」
languages.original_text: "I was weak. Reluctant to be taken in His hands. But then a haze clouded my eyes... And I saw her. A frightened girl. Naaki. The part of me even the ritual of releasing the burden had failed to erase. And I knew that a part of me had always clung to a past I did not even remember. My fear of death subsided. I let Naaki go, for the Undying One had been waiting to take her. And what was broken became whole. Naaki is gone. Only Kibellah remains."

traits.locale_text: 「我は弱かったのです。あの方の手に渡ることに消極的でした。ですが靄で視界が曇って…彼女を見ました。怯えた少女。ナアキです。解放の儀式でさえ、我が一部を消し去ることはできませんでした。そして我が一部は、覚えてもいない過去にしがみついていたのだと知った。死への恐怖は鎮まり、ナアキを解放した。彼女を迎えるために不死の者が待っていたのだから。そして壊れたところが埋まりました。ナアキは死んだのです。残ったのはキベラだけ」

languages.text: “我刚刚濒临死亡，不肯接受不死之神的怀抱，但随后，幻象浮现在我眼前……我看到了她，拿基，那个被吓坏了的女孩。那是我心中的一部分，就连血缚得脱仪式都没能将她彻底抹除。那时我才意识到，我心中的某个部分始终不肯放弃那些我甚至根本不记得的过去。于是，我对死亡的恐惧消散了。我让拿基走了，因为不死之神一直在等待着她。破碎之物再度变得完整，拿基不在了，如今只剩下绮贝菈。”
languages.original_text: "I was weak. Reluctant to be taken in His hands. But then a haze clouded my eyes... And I saw her. A frightened girl. Naaki. The part of me even the ritual of releasing the burden had failed to erase. And I knew that a part of me had always clung to a past I did not even remember. My fear of death subsided. I let Naaki go, for the Undying One had been waiting to take her. And what was broken became whole. Naaki is gone. Only Kibellah remains."

traits.locale_text: “我刚刚濒临死亡，不肯接受不死之神的怀抱，但随后，幻象浮现在我眼前……我看到了她，拿基，那个被吓坏了的女孩。那是我心中的一部分，就连血缚得脱仪式都没能将她彻底抹除。那时我才意识到，我心中的某个部分始终不肯放弃那些我甚至根本不记得的过去。于是，我对死亡的恐惧消散了。我让拿基走了，因为不死之神一直在等待着她。破碎之物再度变得完整，拿基不在了，如今只剩下绮贝菈。”

languages.text: "Ich war schwach. Zögerlich, in seine Hände genommen zu werden. Doch dann trübte ein Nebel meine Augen ... Und ich sah sie. Ein verängstigtes Mädchen. Naaki. Den Teil von mir, den nicht einmal das Ritual zur Linderung der Last hatte auslöschen können. Und ich wusste, dass ein Teil von mir sich immer an eine Vergangenheit geklammert hatte, an die ich mich nicht einmal erinnere. Meine Angst vor dem Tod ließ nach. Ich ließ Naaki gehen, denn der Todlose hatte darauf gewartet, sie mitzunehmen. Und was zerbrochen war, wurde ganz. Naaki ist fort. Nur Kibellah bleibt zurück."
languages.original_text: "I was weak. Reluctant to be taken in His hands. But then a haze clouded my eyes... And I saw her. A frightened girl. Naaki. The part of me even the ritual of releasing the burden had failed to erase. And I knew that a part of me had always clung to a past I did not even remember. My fear of death subsided. I let Naaki go, for the Undying One had been waiting to take her. And what was broken became whole. Naaki is gone. Only Kibellah remains."

languages.text: "Zayıftım. Onun ellerinde nihayete ermeye gönülsüzdüm. Ancak sonrasında gözlerimi müphemlik kapladı ve... Onu gördüm. Korkmuş, küçücük bir kız çocuğu... Naaki. Yükten azat ayininin bile silmeyi başaramadığı bir parçam... Bu parçamın her daim benim bile hatırlamadığım bir geçmişe tutunduğunu biliyordum. Ölümden korkum yatıştı. Naaki'yi azat ettim çünkü Ölmeyen, onu almayı bekliyordu. Parçalanan tekrar bütün oldu. Naaki gitti. Yalnızca Kibellah kaldı."
languages.original_text: "I was weak. Reluctant to be taken in His hands. But then a haze clouded my eyes... And I saw her. A frightened girl. Naaki. The part of me even the ritual of releasing the burden had failed to erase. And I knew that a part of me had always clung to a past I did not even remember. My fear of death subsided. I let Naaki go, for the Undying One had been waiting to take her. And what was broken became whole. Naaki is gone. Only Kibellah remains."
